note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized).
title: Death rate from pregnancy or maternal conditions
subtitle: Reported annual death rate from [maternal conditions](#dod:maternal-mortality) per 100,000 people, based on the [underlying cause of death](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death) listed on death certificates.

display.name: Age-standardized deaths that are from maternal conditions per 100,000 people, in both sexes aged all ages
